word: IN THIS VISION OF 1845 ELLEN SAW THE LITTLE LOYAL GROUP KNEELING BEFORE GOD'S THRONE IN PRAYER. MOST OF THEM AROSE AND FOLLOWED JESUS BY FAITH AS HIS WORK MOVED INTO THE MOST HOLY PLACE. THEY RECEIVED THE HOLY SPIRIT, AND THERE "WAS LIGHT, POWER, AND MUCH LOVE, JOY, AND PEACE."--EARLY WRITINGS, P. 55.
